GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix several use-after-free bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.153 by commit d9ddfeb01fb95ffbbc7031d46a5ee2a5e45cbb86. For more details please see the references link.
